verses.text: \w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* flogged.

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* \w twisted|strong="G4120"\w* \w together|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w crown|strong="G4735"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* thorns, \w set|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* \w His|strong="G2007"\w* \w head|strong="G2776"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w dressed|strong="G4016"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w purple|strong="G4210"\w* \w robe|strong="G2440"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G2064"\w* \w up|strong="G1325"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w again|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w again|strong="G2532"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Hail|strong="G5463"\w*, \w King|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*!” \w and|strong="G2532"\w* slapping \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* face.

\w Once|strong="G3825"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w came|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* Jews, “\w Look|strong="G3708"\w*, \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w am|strong="G2532"\w* bringing \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w let|strong="G1097"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* basis \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* charge \w against|strong="G1722"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*.”

\w When|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w came|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w wearing|strong="G5409"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w crown|strong="G4735"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* thorns \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w purple|strong="G4210"\w* \w robe|strong="G2440"\w*, \w Pilate|strong="G3004"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, “\w Here|strong="G2400"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* man!”

\w As|strong="G1722"\w* \w soon|strong="G1722"\w* \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w chief|strong="G2532"\w* priests \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w officers|strong="G5257"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* shouted, “\w Crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*! \w Crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*!” “\w You|strong="G5210"\w* \w take|strong="G2983"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*,” \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w replied|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* basis \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* charge \w against|strong="G1722"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*.”

“\w We|strong="G2249"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*,” answered \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, “\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w must|strong="G2453"\w* die, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w declared|strong="G3754"\w* \w Himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.”

\w When|strong="G3753"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* heard \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w statement|strong="G3056"\w*, \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w even|strong="G3123"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w*,

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G1525"\w* \w back|strong="G3825"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Praetorium|strong="G4232"\w*. “\w Where|strong="G4159"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w You|strong="G4771"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w*?” \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* answer.

\w So|strong="G3767"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*, “\w Do|strong="G1492"\w* \w You|strong="G4771"\w* \w refuse|strong="G3756"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*? \w Do|strong="G1492"\w* \w You|strong="G4771"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* release \w You|strong="G4771"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w You|strong="G4771"\w*?”

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* answered, “\w You|strong="G4771"\w* \w would|strong="G1510"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w* \w over|strong="G3860"\w* \w Me|strong="G1325"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w it|strong="G1487"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w from|strong="G2596"\w* above. \w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1223"\w* \w one|strong="G3762"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w handed|strong="G3860"\w* \w Me|strong="G1325"\w* \w over|strong="G3860"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* guilty \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w greater|strong="G3173"\w* sin.”

\w From|strong="G1537"\w* \w then|strong="G1161"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w*, \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w tried|strong="G2212"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* release \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w kept|strong="G4160"\w* \w shouting|strong="G2905"\w*, “\w If|strong="G1437"\w* \w you|strong="G1437"\w* release \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w*, \w you|strong="G1437"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w friend|strong="G5384"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Caesar|strong="G2541"\w*. \w Anyone|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* declares \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w king|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* defying \w Caesar|strong="G2541"\w*.”

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* heard \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w out|strong="G1854"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sat|strong="G2523"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* judgment \w seat|strong="G2523"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Stone \w Pavement|strong="G3038"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="G1447"\w* \f + \fr 19:13 \ft Or in Aramaic; also in verses 17 and 20\f* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w Gabbatha|strong="G1042"\w*.

\w It|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w day|strong="G3904"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Preparation|strong="G3904"\w* \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Passover|strong="G3957"\w*, \w about|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w sixth|strong="G1623"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w*.\f + \fr 19:14 \ft That is, about noon\f* \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G3004"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, “\w Here|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w King|strong="G3588"\w*!”

\w At|strong="G3756"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w*, \w they|strong="G3588"\w* shouted, “Away \w with|strong="G2192"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*! Away \w with|strong="G2192"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*! \w Crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*!” “\w Shall|strong="G3361"\w* \w I|strong="G1487"\w* \w crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w your|strong="G2192"\w* \w King|strong="G3588"\w*?” \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w*. “\w We|strong="G1487"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w king|strong="G3588"\w* \w but|strong="G1487"\w* \w Caesar|strong="G2541"\w*,” \w replied|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* chief priests. The Crucifixion (Psalms 22:1–31; Matthew 27:32–44; Mark 15:21–32; Luke 23:26–43)

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G3860"\w* \w handed|strong="G3860"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w over|strong="G3860"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G2443"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*, \w and|strong="G2424"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* soldiers \w took|strong="G3880"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* away.

Carrying \w His|strong="G1438"\w* \w own|strong="G1438"\w* \w cross|strong="G4716"\w*, \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w Place|strong="G5117"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Skull|strong="G2898"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="G1447"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Golgotha|strong="G1115"\w*.

\w There|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w others|strong="G3588"\w*, \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w on|strong="G1161"\w* \w each|strong="G3326"\w* \w side|strong="G1782"\w*, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w middle|strong="G3319"\w*.

\w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* notice posted \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w cross|strong="G4716"\w*. \w It|strong="G2532"\w* \w read|strong="G1125"\w*: \w JESUS|strong="G2424"\w* \w OF|strong="G2532"\w* \w NAZARETH|strong="G3480"\w*, \w THE|strong="G2532"\w* \w KING|strong="G3588"\w* \w OF|strong="G2532"\w* \w THE|strong="G2532"\w* \w JEWS|strong="G2453"\w*.

\w Many|strong="G4183"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w read|strong="G1125"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* sign, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w near|strong="G1451"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="G1447"\w*, \w Latin|strong="G4515"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Greek|strong="G1676"\w*.

\w So|strong="G3767"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* chief priests \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w*, “\w Do|strong="G3004"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w write|strong="G1125"\w*, ‘\w The|strong="G3588"\w* \w King|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*,’ \w but|strong="G3361"\w* only \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w He|strong="G3754"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w I|strong="G3754"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w King|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*.’”

\w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* answered, “\w What|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G3588"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G3588"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*.”

\w When|strong="G3753"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* divided \w His|strong="G1223"\w* \w garments|strong="G2440"\w* \w into|strong="G2424"\w* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w parts|strong="G3313"\w*, \w one|strong="G1538"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w each|strong="G1538"\w* \w soldier|strong="G4757"\w*, \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w tunic|strong="G5509"\w* remaining. \w It|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* seamless, \w woven|strong="G5307"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1538"\w* \w piece|strong="G3313"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* top \w to|strong="G2532"\w* bottom.

\w So|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w one|strong="G1438"\w* \w another|strong="G1438"\w*, “\w Let|strong="G1510"\w* \w us|strong="G3004"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w tear|strong="G4977"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w*. Instead, \w let|strong="G1510"\w* \w us|strong="G3004"\w* \w cast|strong="G2532"\w* \w lots|strong="G2819"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* see \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \w will|strong="G5101"\w* \w get|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w*.” \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w fulfill|strong="G4137"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Scripture|strong="G1124"\w*: “\w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w divided|strong="G1266"\w* \w My|strong="G1473"\w* \w garments|strong="G2440"\w* \w among|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cast|strong="G2532"\w* \w lots|strong="G2819"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w My|strong="G1473"\w* \w clothing|strong="G2440"\w*.”\f + \fr 19:24 \ft Psalms 22:18\f* \w So|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w*.

Near \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w cross|strong="G4716"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w His|strong="G2532"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w her|strong="G3137"\w* sister, \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w well|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* wife \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Clopas|strong="G2832"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w Magdalene|strong="G3094"\w*.

\w When|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w His|strong="G3708"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* loved \w standing|strong="G3936"\w* \w nearby|strong="G3936"\w*, \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w His|strong="G3708"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w*, “\w Woman|strong="G1135"\w*, \w here|strong="G3936"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w*.”

The Death of Jesus (Psalms 22:1–31; Matthew 27:45–56; Mark 15:33–41; Luke 23:44–49)
